name: DarkVishnya
descr: [DarkVishnya](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0105) is a financially motivated threat actor targeting financial institutions in Eastern Europe. In 2017-2018 the group attacked at least 8 banks in this region.(Citation: Securelist DarkVishnya Dec 2018)

technique_table_data.name: Brute Force
technique_table_data.descr: [DarkVishnya](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0105) used brute-force attack to obtain login data.(Citation: Securelist DarkVishnya Dec 2018)

subtechniques.name: PowerShell
subtechniques.descr: [DarkVishnya](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0105) used PowerShell to create shellcode loaders.(Citation: Securelist DarkVishnya Dec 2018)

subtechniques.name: Windows Service
subtechniques.descr: [DarkVishnya](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0105) created new services for shellcode loaders distribution.(Citation: Securelist DarkVishnya Dec 2018)

technique_table_data.name: Hardware Additions
technique_table_data.descr: [DarkVishnya](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0105) physically connected Bash Bunny, Raspberry Pi, netbooks, and inexpensive laptops to the target organization's environment to access the companyâ€™s local network.(Citation: Securelist DarkVishnya Dec 2018)

technique_table_data.name: Network Service Discovery
technique_table_data.descr: [DarkVishnya](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0105) performed port scanning to obtain the list of active services.(Citation: Securelist DarkVishnya Dec 2018)

technique_table_data.name: Network Share Discovery
technique_table_data.descr: [DarkVishnya](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0105) scanned the network for public shared folders.(Citation: Securelist DarkVishnya Dec 2018)

technique_table_data.name: Network Sniffing
technique_table_data.descr: [DarkVishnya](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0105) used network sniffing to obtain login data. (Citation: Securelist DarkVishnya Dec 2018)

technique_table_data.name: Non-Standard Port
technique_table_data.descr: [DarkVishnya](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0105) used ports 5190 and 7900 for shellcode listeners, and 4444, 4445, 31337 for shellcode C2.(Citation: Securelist DarkVishnya Dec 2018)

subtechniques.name: Tool
subtechniques.descr: [DarkVishnya](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0105) has obtained and used tools such as [Impacket](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0357), [Winexe](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0191), and [PsExec](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0029).(Citation: Securelist DarkVishnya Dec 2018)

technique_table_data.name: Remote Access Tools
technique_table_data.descr: [DarkVishnya](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0105) used DameWare Mini Remote Control for lateral movement.(Citation: Securelist DarkVishnya Dec 2018)

Securelist DarkVishnya Dec 2018.description: Golovanov, S. (2018, December 6). DarkVishnya: Banks attacked through direct connection to local network. Retrieved May 15, 2020.
